history.content:
Yes, you should both see a confirmation screen and get a confirmation email that your app has been successfully submitted. See below for example. If you did not receive one, please resubmit. You can indicate the note about CS 188 in the statement of purpose section.

Dear ,

Your application for the L&S CS major has been successfully submitted!

Please note that your application will be processed at the end of the term, when grades are made available to the department (which is usually 1-2 weeks later than when grades are available to you).

Some enrollment ideas until you're declared:
For phase 1 of Telebears, you could enroll in technical electives, or the lower division EE requirement. When phase 2 begins, you can waitlist for CS upper divs, and once declared, will automatically be given major priority for CS upper-division courses.

If you have any questions, please email us at cs-advising@cs.berkeley.edu.

Am I supposed to get a confirmation email after submitting the major application? Also, how do I specify on the application that I want my 188 grade to be included in the gpa calculation? (I was admitted Fall 2014)
history.subject: CS Major Declaration Application
